answers.answer: I learned not to listen to everyone lol they made it seem so horrible. I got fruitpunch flavor and thought it was delicious since I love fruit punch.  Not as bad as I thought !
I liked it I thought it tasted like flat orange pop
When do you get them done? :'o this is the first I'm hearing of this, lol

It tasted like sugary water to me lol. I had gestational diabetes with my last two pregnancies so i felt horrible after drinking it. Are you just doing a one-hour? Im not lookong forward to it with this baby but yours will probably not be bad . Good luck :)
Bunch of bull, I got the orange & it tasted like a flat crush. Wasn't bad at all
Yeah i had fruit punch to it was good but a little to sweet for me. it taste different to everyone and also ive 2 different things about the orange, it was to sweet or watered down orange pop
Mine wasnt bad at all I actually liked it!
Mine wasn't that bad. I had fruit punch. I didn't think it tasted good but I drank it really fast and the worst part was waiting the hour. So glad I passed mine the first time!
Mine tasted like flat orange soda. It wasnt that bad. Im still waiting to get my results back. I just did mine this past friday
It was easy as pie for me. The drink is really not that horrible. And you have 5 minutes to drink it.
The orange one made me really sick it was so gross, I was puking at the hospital.

question: How was everyones experience with their glucose testing? I hear the drinks taste horrible and way too sweet. I'm getting dressed for mine right now :0
title: Glucose test today
